::Hevng::

The clone of Nightlight's former bodyguard fought through the terrain and weather for sometime before eventually arriving at Atlantis. He transforms to robot mode and would read as a Maximal. No one could know that he was a clone being controlled by Lord Jhiaxus of the G2 Decepticon Empire. Hevng walks into the open areas of the city before coming to the Maximal base. He opens a comm channel on an old personal channel used by Rodimus' family and friends.

Hevng: Nightlight, do you read?

       
---------------------------------
Never miss a thing.   Make Yahoo your homepage.
